name: EGO (itch) (Darud Lingilien)
description:
EGO it's a stealth platform game, where you control a man who wants to escape from the horrible place where he is, a prison deep in the earth.

Hide, avoid the traps, and maybe you can escape from the horror ...

INFORMATION: The soundtrack is composed of songs from Freesound.com, if you want to know what they are, in the download file there is a text file referring to it.
